title: SOLD: N172 Art Whitney, Pittsburgh, excellent image...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: N172 Art Whitney, Pittsburgh, excellent image...
posts.post_content:
For sale is a N172 Old Judge depicting Art Whitney with Pittsburg(h). The image contrast is excellent. 

$SOLD net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
I'll take it!  Thanks - PM being sent.

Call this N54 Feedback

AAAAAA++++++

Frigging image on the card is better than advertised!  Look at the date today, 24JUN20.  Look when it was purchased (20JUN24).  That's a total 4 day turn-around.

Must have been a little luck involved because the knucklehead delivery person on my route didn't screw up the delivery!
